text: The Joong-ang Ilbo (Hangul: , Hanja:) is a big South Korean newspaper. Another name is Korean Joong-ang Ilbo. == Korea JoongAng Daily == The Korea JoongAng Daily is the English language version of the newspaper, and it is one of three big English-language daily newspapers in South Korea, along with The Korea Times and The Korea Herald. == References == == Other websites == * Joong-ang Ilbo:English * The Joong-ang Ilbo:Sisamedia * American Joong-ang Ilbo Category:1960s establishments in South Korea Category:1965 establishments in Asia Category:Newspapers published in South Korea
title: JoongAng Ilbo
